definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
cabbage (round cabbage most commonly found in Western countries)
one man's meat is another man's poison (idiom)/to each his own
pinyin: luo2 bo5 bai2 cai4 , ge4 you3 suo3 ai4

sentences.english: The vegetable farmers space out the Chinese cabbage about 30cm apart.
sentences.chinese: 菜農每隔約30公分種一顆大白菜。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the absorption characteristics and mechanism of bergenin in rat intestine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巖白菜素在大鼠腸道中的吸收機理。

sentences.english: I remember it only had winter cabbages, right?
sentences.chinese: 我記得只有冬儲大白菜，對吧？

sentences.english: Many people do not like certain foods, I for one don't like cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 許多人不喜歡喫某種食物，例如我就不喜歡喫圓白菜。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the flower you have mentioned is nothing but a cabbage!
sentences.chinese: 另外，你所說的花兒只不過是一棵白菜。

sentences.english: Wheat bran and cabbage help maintain estrogen at healthy levels.
sentences.chinese: 麥麩和圓白菜可幫助維護女性荷爾蒙在健康級別。

sentences.english: These were then combined with cabbage and some kind of hot sauce.
sentences.chinese: 過一會兒加了些大白菜和什麼熱醬進去。

sentences.english: And for one kilogram of Chinese leaves, half would be discarded before packaging.
sentences.chinese: 一千克的大白菜，在包裝之前，一半會被丟棄。

sentences.english: Pay attention how thin the slices are.
sentences.chinese: 請注意這些薄如紙張的白菜切片。

sentences.english: The cabbages germinated within a week.
sentences.chinese: 白菜一星期內就抽芽了。

sentences.english: Green leafy vegetables, like broccoli and Chinese cabbage, are also calcium-rich.
sentences.chinese: 綠葉蔬菜，如花椰菜和大白菜，也都富含鈣質。

sentences.english: Today, Chinese cabbage is no longer the main dish for northern people in winter.
sentences.chinese: 如今，大白菜不再是北方人冬天的當家菜。

sentences.english: HPLC method for bergenin determination Bergenia purpurascens was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立測定了巖白菜中巖白菜素含量的方法。

sentences.english: HPLC method for bergenin determination Bergenia purpurascens was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立測定了巖白菜中巖白菜素含量的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the kinetics of intestine absorption of bergenin in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巖白菜素在大鼠腸道內的吸收動力學特徵。

sentences.english: Therefore these varieties are not suitable for stuffing cultivation in summer.
sentences.chinese: 均不適宜作夏季餡用大棵小白菜栽培。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
